Title: 5 Ideas to Include Every Child in Your Classroom (e240)
Description:
We can include every child in our classroom with these five important reminders from inclusion expert, Toby Karten.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e240

PowerSchool is my SIS and LMS and is the sponsor of today’s show. On January 31, they have a free webinar “Preparing Students for Success: Measuring What Matters” about preparing students for success and measuring what matters. Jake Cotton, a superintendent from Virginia, will be sharing.
